articles.title: English cricket loses key sponsorship deals
articles.description: Car retailer Cazoo and insurance firm LV= both opt against renewing sponsorship deals with English cricket.
articles.content:
Cazoo sponsored the first two years of The Hundred

articles.title: Chef at Clarke’s ‘last supper’ speaks out

articles.content:
